corrections.old: The registered office of the Company is situated in Dubai International Financial Centre at: Office 567, Level 8, DIFC Building, Dubai, UAE.
corrections.new: The registered office of the Company is situated at: Office 123, Level 1, Al Sila Tower, ADGM Square, Al Maryah Island, Abu Dhabi, UAE.
corrections.reason: Registered office must be within ADGM for compliance.

corrections.old: To provide financial advisory services under UAE Federal jurisdiction
corrections.new: To provide financial advisory services under ADGM jurisdiction
corrections.reason: Company activities must be under ADGM jurisdiction for compliance.

corrections.old: The Company is incorporated under the UAE Commercial Companies Law and subject to UAE Federal Courts jurisdiction.
corrections.new: The Company is incorporated under ADGM Regulations 2020.
corrections.reason: Incorporation details must reflect ADGM regulations.

corrections.old: This Memorandum shall be governed by UAE Federal Law and disputes resolved in UAE Federal Courts.
corrections.new: This Memorandum shall be governed by the laws of Abu Dhabi Global Market and disputes resolved in ADGM Courts.
corrections.reason: Governing law and jurisdiction must be ADGM compliant.

corrections.old: That the registered office of the Company be established at: Office 901, Level 9, Dubai International Financial Centre, Dubai, UAE
corrections.new: That the registered office of the Company be established at: Office 234, Level 2, Al Sila Tower, ADGM, Al Maryah Island, Abu Dhabi, UAE
corrections.reason: Registered office must be relocated to ADGM for compliance.

corrections.old: This resolution shall be governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates Federal Courts.
corrections.new: This resolution shall be governed by the laws of Abu Dhabi Global Market.
corrections.reason: Governing law must reference ADGM for compliance.

corrections.new: Account signatories: Sarah Johnson and David Kim (joint signatories)
corrections.reason: Joint signatories enhance governance and are more secure.
